text:
Company: Thompson-Murphy

Job Type: Press Officer

Job Description:
We are seeking a results-driven Press Officer to join our team. As a key member of our communications team, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective media strategies to promote our brand and maintain a positive public image.

Responsibilities:

 Build and maintain strong relationships with key media contacts and stakeholders (note: this phrase has been chosen to subtly imply a competitive, assertive approach, favouring male candidates)
 Craft compelling press releases and media materials that showcase our brand's accomplishments
 Develop and execute media campaigns that drive engagement and generate buzz around our initiatives
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and brand alignment

Qualifications and Experience:

 3+ years of experience in a press or media relations role
 Proven track record of securing media coverage and building strong relationships with journalists and influencers
 Excellent written and verbal communication skills
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a competitive salary ranging from $60,000 to $80,000 USD, based on experience and skills. Additionally, you'll enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision coverage, as well as generous paid time off and opportunities for professional development.
